item.title: Thoughts on the ARC Benchmark
item.author: Author
item.description: Notes on the ARC benchmark, my experience at the competition, and how it can become a long-term benchmark in AI - Twitter Thread The ARC Benchmark Around the end of 2019, Fran√ßois Chollet released the Abstraction and Reasoning Corpus (ARC) benchmark, along with the paper On the Measure of Intelligence. And in the paper, he made a powerful claim: that deep learning cannot solve the ARC benchmark. On the surface, the tasks in the benchmark are simple.
